content:
matthew Knight Arena is on schedule even if it means staying a little later in the workday says Projects Superintendent Adam Bonner of Hoffman Construction PERIOD The Emerald and other members of the press toured the arenas construction zone Friday morning PERIOD The 75foot high structure from the street should have the concrete set by Oct PERIOD  PERIOD All the steel should be in by lateMarch and the roof on by the time the rainy season is over PERIOD Starting in February the Alumni Center will be built above the underground threelevel parking structure PERIOD Bonner estimates that on average at this time about  workers are on site but once March ends and the steel is in the number will nearly double PERIOD

The panorama was taken from the main concourse level looking down toward the north side of the arena the secondary image is from the worst seat in the house Bonner said PERIOD



lmontgomerydailyemerald.com
